alert.note: Alert for Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 11:04PM CST until February 19 at 9:45PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Central Alabama, including the following counties, Dallas, Marengo and Perry. * WHEN...Until 130 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1104 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Marion, Uniontown, Thomaston, Faunsdale, Dayton, Vaiden, Marion Junction, Vaiden Field Airport, Perry County Correctional Center, Judson College, Suttle and Radford.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
